__TOC__

''Shove'' is a distro independent application to move desktop configurations and applications seamlessly between machines running Linux. This site hosts design specifications for the various features in ''Shove''. Further details and status on the development of this project can be found at <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/shove]]</nowiki>. 

=== Feature Specifications ===

Each feature below is associated with a project blueprint in launchpad. To add a feature to this list please have it approved as a blueprint first. Shove blueprints can be found at <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/shove/]]</nowiki>.

* ListUserInstalledPkgs
